title: Synergistic self-driven and heterogeneous effect of a biomass-derived urchin-like Mn3O4/C3N4 Janus micromotor catalyst for efficient degradation of carbamazepine
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28904-28914
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04980B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jie Yang, Wenning Yang, Chao Zhang, Jian Gong, Ming Xu, Jia Li, Chengzhang Liu
Here, we present biomass-derived urchin-like Mn3O4/C3N4 Janus micromotor catalyst for efficient degradation of carbamazepine. This method provides a promising pathway for rational construction and preparation of movable catalysts for efficient removal of organic pollutants from wastewater.
